abstract: Russia defeats United States, 2-1, to advance to world junior hockey championship game against Finland.

headline.print_headline: Russia to Face Finland in Juniors Final
headline.main: Russia to Face Finland in Juniors Final

snippet: Yegor Korshkov had a goal and an assist, and Russia advanced to the gold medal game of the world junior hockey championship with a 2-1 win over the United States in Helsinki.
lead_paragraph: Yegor Korshkov had a goal and an assist, and Russia advanced to the gold medal game of the world junior hockey championship with a 2-1 win over the United States in Helsinki.
